小編一直好奇怪，墨西哥接受咗美國重新訂立嘅 NAFTA[1]（依家叫 USMCA 喇），點解加拿大遲遲唔肯落疊，直至呢兩日？

原來 USMCA 暗藏殺機－－要美國市場定係中国市場，只可二擇其一，冇得食兩邊茶禮... 絕呀😍

／USMCA includes language that requires signatories to give notice if they plan to negotiate a free trade deal with a “non-market country,” and to allow the other two signatories at least a month to review any agreement before it is signed. It explicitly states that if one of the signatories enters into such an agreement, the other two have the right to withdraw from the USMCA with six months’ notice.

The use of the phrase “non-market country” seems a clear reference to China.／
